DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if differences in the design of multifocal intra-ocular lenses would mean different values of higher-order aberrations and different performance in objective parameters such as modulation transfer function.
DOC.brief_title: Wavefront Analyzes and Visual Performance of Three Multifocal Intra-ocular Lenses
DOC.criteria: Patients with bilateral visually significant cataract with corneal astigmatism lower than 1.0D Any ocular diseases, such as: corneal opacities or irregularity dry eye amblyopia anisometropia glaucoma retinal abnormality Surgical complications IOL tilt IOL decentration greater than 0.4 mm (estimated by retroillumination) Incomplete followup
